pageContext.claim: “We couldn't even get near the arena [in Grand Rapids, Mich.], there were 32,000 people. I finished speaking at 1 o'clock in the morning on election day — 32,000 people.”
pageContext.analysis: The DeVos Place in downtown Grand Rapids, Mich., where Trump held the rally, has a capacity of 4,200, according to the Detroit Free Press. Perhaps that many were waiting outside, for a total of 8,000, local media estimated.
